nodes.text: The Echo systems were a number of star systems where the New Republic pilot pictured himself retiring to and eventually dying and living at a tube-yacht. Around 5 ABY, Tensent described his ideal death at the Echo systems during a game of Who? What? Where?, where the participants list who first heard of the individual's death, what killed the individual, and where the death took place.
The Echo systems were mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, the second volume of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy which was written by Alexander Freed.
